actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Motion to table motion to discharge the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service passed House, roll call #566 (278-123).

official_title: Resolution disapproving the Federal pay comparability alternative plan proposed by the President.

summary.text: Disapproves the Federal pay comparability alternative plan proposed by the President on August 29, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the Federal pay comparability alternative plan proposed by the President.
